casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

May, 1951.

(May 2, 1951.) Robert H. Nowak, an Infant, by John J. Nowak, His Guardian ad Litem, Appellant, v. Aquinas Institute of Rochester, Respondent.

Judgment affirmed, without costs of this appeal to either party. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment dismissing the complaint in a negligence action.) Present — Taylor, P. J., McCurn, Kimball, Piper and Wheeler, JJ.
